评论详情: The material is thin but everything is thin these days.  I like the way the shirt is made.  I give it 5 stars

I just looove this top!  I now own several of these in different colors and patterns. The fit is true to size and it makes my waist look smaller than it is. The sides come up just a little but it’s attractive in the design of the top without revealing too much. I’m a busty girl and the pleats down the front somehow minimizes my bust.  I like the fabric and it is soft and doesn’t wrinkle when traveling. I’m impressed with the overall top for casual dress with jeans or dressier pants.  It’s my now favorite go to top for daily wear.
Fits and hangs well on the body!  So soft and I love the pattern!
Love it
I would buy again.
Its beautiful and fixs well
Washed nice and fit was very flattering on a older lady
I love this top. The fit is perfect and I love the material.
Very nice and made well. I purchased 4!  Fits as described.
The fit was perfect. The color was brilliant. I love my new shirt. Will buy a different color next time.
The top is really pretty, nice material, comfortable and very flattering.
VERY NICE BLOUSE

Too small in the busy and too big every where else. Sleeves were at least 4" too long....why do manufacturers think the sleeves should be longer on plus sizes...our arms did not grow when we gained weight!

This is a lovely shirt with a pretty Paisley pattern that's perfect for cooler weather.  I'm 5ft 4in and this top fits me perfectly.  I have long arms and the sleeves fit me with enough length to move around freely.  It has about a 3" cuff.  I'm apple shaped and the styling and fabric drapes softly over my torso without making me look like I'm wearing a tent.  The length falls at lower hip length.  Washes and dries up beautifully.  These shirts are excellent Mainstays for your wardrobe and perfect for casual, office or formal wear.  Also great for travelling as they fold up small and don't wrinkle.  Great value for the money.

You have as a description of this blouse that it is a tunic and it is not a tunic it is a regular blouse.  I would like to return it and order a tunic.  I need the tunic length and I have washed the blouse and thrown away the tags.
The color was nothing like the picture, it was not blue, more dark pink.  Other than that it was just ok.

评论概述: Soft buttery comfort and perfect fit
评论详情: Cute style with ruffled sleeve top, cuffs, pleated detailing, with just the right flair to be flattering without cling but not big like a tent. Very comfortable. Good quality value. I bought XXL in the pink/red small floral print. The fabric color is pretty and rich like a jewel tone. Not too bright, but not pastel.  I am 70 yr old, 5,3”, big bellied 211 pounds, 42DD bra size. This top will be a favorite all winter. I tried a black long cardigan sweater vest over it and that worked well. Am very happy with this purchase.
I've worn this top twice and received numerous compliments.  Perfect for Fall.  Love it.
Pretty top and it fits well. (Large fit me perfectly - 5'2"; 175lbs) Seems to be decently made with good material.

It has finally turned cool enough for me to wear this top, and I am really enjoying it.  It looks very pretty on, and works for a range of occasions.  It goes from work to dinner very easily.  The fabric is very soft and the design is lovely.  I like the design touches like the tucking on the front, the tighter cuffs, and the gathered shoulders.  It fits quite true to size, and the length is flattering.
Really liked the top, but it was a little small for the size I ordere.
looked better in the picture and did not like the material.

While the top itself is nice and fits well the pattern I selected isn’t even close to the picture. I ordered the green daisy and it’s nothing like what’s shown. It’s a dark blue background has none of the larger flowers. If you order a solid color I’m sure you’ll be fine but buyer beware with the prints. I will be returning it

Love the cotton fabric, perfect top for Fall, not too hot. I like the lil puffy shoulders & peplum kinda style waist to hide tummy.  The shirt looks very feminine on & has a nice shape to it. Love the long length. Looks great with jeans or leggings.  I wear a size 16/18 & the XL fit perfect.
Fits great. Nice color. Lightweight and has good feel.

I found this blouse to run small. I ordered an XL and it's a bit tight and clingy for my taste. It's too short as well, and I'm only 5'3" tall. The fabric, which is a cotton/polyester/spandex blend, is thin. I also don't care much for the puffed shoulders. This blouse might be to someone else's liking, but it's not for me.

I like this top for many reasons. It is very soft and comfortable. It drapes nicely. The sleeves are a perfect length, right to the knuckle on my thumb. I am 5'8" tall. It does not look as long on me as it did the model, but it is a good length. The tucks leading into gathers give it some shape beyond a regular T-shirt. It is fairly lightweight but is loose fitting enough that you could wear a cami or turtleneck under it during cold weather. I would definitely buy again.

I am so glad that I ordered this Bette Boutik long sleeve top for this Autumn! It is so well made, so stylish and comes in twenty colors! All this at under $25.00! I ordered the print called Crimson Cashew and it is lovely, rich jewel tones. The tiny pleats on the bodice give it visual interest, and there is a small box pleat on the back to add motion in the back. Nice Top for you or a gift!

I really like this blouse. The purple color is a bit deeper than the photo shows but that doesn't bother me. It's perfect to wear as is a bit casual with jeans or a skirt. I'm also looking forward to wearing it in a bit more formal outfit with dress pants and a blazer. It's a very soft blouse and there is a nice subtle design on the front that has lines going down. It's also stretchy.

评论概述: Not as slim fit as the photos, just ok.
评论详情: Got this for my wife and when she wears it it’s just not super flattering. It’s a little boxier than the photos and she doesn’t feel it fits her well as the size indicates it should. It’s pretty loose fitting and just doesn’t do it for her. Overall the quality is decent for the price but the fit isn’t there. It isn’t the size, it’s the fit.
